"Star Gems and the SG Shop":
"SG, or \"Star Gems\", are a partly free, partly paid-for currency that you can spend on a variety of convenience features.

Star Gems can be acquired from a few in-game sources, but you can also buy them from the AC & SG Shop."

"At the SG Shop, you can pay for a wide range of convenient features, such as Rental Storage.

You can also spend SG on the SG Scratch for a chance at all sorts of items, such as appealing outfits."
